des: "Great recipe, even better than crispy rice squares!!! These have marshmallows, coconut, almonds and cornflake cereal. Very tasty, very easy"
ins: Combine the butter and marshmallows in a medium saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until melted. Stir in the toasted almonds and cornflakes. Press into a 9x13 inch baking pan and let sit for 1/2 hour. Cut into squares and enjoy!
